My #EndCorruptionNow bill would make sure all govt employees – including unpaid White House staff, even family-member advisors to the President – are forced to comply with govt ethics & conflict of interest rules.

Unlike Trump, I do not believe this country is about terrorizing 11 million undocumented people and throwing them out of the country. I believe we need to build an immigration system based on justice, humanity and a path toward citizenship.

More than 11,400 people joined us last night in Denver.
All across this country, people are tired of the greed of the billionaire class.

They're tired of a corrupt political system that leaves working people behind.
